name: edex-ui
description: A science fiction desktop running everywhere. Awesome.

scripts.install-linux: npm install && cd src && npm install && ./../node_modules/.bin/electron-rebuild -f -w node-pty && cd ..
scripts.preinstall-windows: npm install --global --production windows-build-tools && npm install --global node-gyp && setx PYTHON "%USERPROFILE%\.windows-build-tools\python27\python.exe"
scripts.install-windows: npm install && cd src && npm install && ..\node_modules\.bin\electron-rebuild -f -w node-pty && cd ..
scripts.prebuild-linux: mkdir prebuild-src && cp -Rv src/* prebuild-src/ && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install
scripts.prebuild-darwin: mkdir prebuild-src && cp -Rv src/* prebuild-src/ && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install
scripts.prebuild-windows: mkdir prebuild-src && xcopy src\* prebuild-src\ /E /C /Q /Y && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install
scripts.test: rsync -a --info=progress2 src prebuild-src --exclude node_modules && node prebuild-minify.js && rm -R prebuild-src
scripts.init-file-icons: rm -Rf file-icons && mkdir file-icons && git clone https://github.com/file-icons/atom.git file-icons/atom && git clone https://github.com/FortAwesome/Font-Awesome.git file-icons/font-awesome && git clone https://github.com/file-icons/source.git file-icons/source && git clone https://github.com/file-icons/DevOpicons.git file-icons/devopicons && git clone https://github.com/file-icons/MFixx.git file-icons/mfixx
scripts.update-file-icons: cd file-icons/source && git pull && cd ../devopicons && git pull && cd ../mfixx && git pull && cd ../atom && git pull && cd ../font-awesome && git pull && cd ../.. && node file-icons-generator.js

author: GitSquared <squared@codebrew.fr>
